titles.title: There's A People Of God Coming Forth In The Earth

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There's a people of God coming forth in the earth
Being brought out of judgement that they might give birth
To the mighty love of God that chooses to see
The nature of Christ dwelling in you and me.
We have chosen to walk in meekness and love
Leaving behind the rod
We have chosen to walk in meekness and love
Living more and more in God.
There's a people of God being brought forth to give birth
To the order of Melchizedec - they'll rule and reign on earth
Caught up to the throne and having God's name
